tool.name: Helixer
tool.command:
mkdir -p $output.files_path && /usr/local/bin/fetch_helixer_models.py &&
Helixer.py --fasta-path '$input' --species '$species' --lineage $lineage.lineages --gff-output-path $output --batch-size $predictions_parameters.batch_size --window-size $post_processing.window_size --min-coding-length $post_processing.min_coding_length --edge-threshold $post_processing.edge_threshold --peak-threshold $post_processing.peak_threshold --t \${GALAXY_SLOTS:-1} --temporary-dir '$output.files_path'
#if str( $lineage.lineages ) == "land_plant": --subsequence-length $lineage.subsequence_length #if str( $lineage.option_overlap.Option_overlaps ) == "true": --overlap-offset $lineage.option_overlap.overlap_offset --overlap-core-length $lineage.option_overlap.overlap_core_length #elif str( $lineage.option_overlap.Option_overlaps ) == "false": $lineage.option_overlap.no_overlap --overlap-offset $lineage.option_overlap.overlap_offset --overlap-core-length $lineage.option_overlap.overlap_core_length #end if

#elif str( $lineage.lineages ) == "invertebrate": --subsequence-length $lineage.subsequence_length #if str( $lineage.option_overlap.Option_overlaps ) == "true": --overlap-offset $lineage.option_overlap.overlap_offset --overlap-core-length $lineage.option_overlap.overlap_core_length #elif str( $lineage.option_overlap.Option_overlaps ) == "false": $lineage.option_overlap.no_overlap --overlap-offset $lineage.option_overlap.overlap_offset --overlap-core-length $lineage.option_overlap.overlap_core_length #end if
